channel.title: Architecture on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Architecture on Blog

item.title: Generational ZGC
item.description: Improve application performance by extending the Z Garbage Collector (ZGC) to maintain separate generations for young and old objects. This will allow ZGC to collect young objects — which tend to die young — more frequently.

item.title: Comparison of ReadyNow and CRaC
item.description: Comparing CRaC and Azul Prime ReadyNow through mainstream microservice frameworks.

item.title: CRaC: Brief analysis of 4+1 view architecture
item.description: A brief analysis of the CRaC architecture is mainly conducted from the 4+1 perspective.
